title: Game-Based Language Learning: Advanced Language Proficiency Development Through Role-Playing

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and adaptability to digital gaming environments
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment utilizing role-playing game mechanics for adult language learners

learning_goals: Learners can apply target language grammatical structures with 90% accuracy while role-playing as virtual characters.
Learners can enhance language fluency (speaking/writing) by 40% compared to pre-assessment through game-based collaborative tasks.
Learners can develop three or more communication strategies by analyzing game scenarios reflecting cultural contexts.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
